about_the_game:
X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: Australia, Oceania, Pacfic is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default Oceania/Pacific Scenery.

X-Plane 12, built by pilots and engineers – for everyone.


New Engine Features in X-Plane 12
  • Volumetric 3D Clouds
  • Physics-Based Photometric Lighting Model
  • Worldwide 3D Water
  • Rewritten AI Air Traffic Control System
  • Global 3D Forests
  • Seasonal Textures and Weather Effects
  • Revamped Real Weather Data

New Aircraft in X-Plane 12
  • Airbus A330
  • Cessna Citation X
  • Lancair Evolution
  • Cirrus SR22
  • Piper PA-18 Super Cub
  • Van's RV-10
  • Robinson R22 (plus a floats version)
detailed_description:
X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: Australia, Oceania, Pacfic is a free DLC that you can activate thru your Steam Client. It will give you the default Oceania/Pacific Scenery.

X-Plane 12, built by pilots and engineers – for everyone.


New Engine Features in X-Plane 12
  • Volumetric 3D Clouds
  • Physics-Based Photometric Lighting Model
  • Worldwide 3D Water
  • Rewritten AI Air Traffic Control System
  • Global 3D Forests
  • Seasonal Textures and Weather Effects
  • Revamped Real Weather Data

New Aircraft in X-Plane 12
  • Airbus A330
  • Cessna Citation X
  • Lancair Evolution
  • Cirrus SR22
  • Piper PA-18 Super Cub
  • Van's RV-10
  • Robinson R22 (plus a floats version)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Varies
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, i5, i7, or i9 CPU with 4 or more cores, or AMD Ryzen 3, 5, 7 or 9.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A Vulkan 1.3-capable video card from NVIDIA or AMD with at least 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We have developers using Ubuntu 20.04 LTS and newer successfully, however we don’t provide support for specific distributions. We require proprietary GPU drivers.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Varies
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8600k or Ryzen 5 3500 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A DirectX 12-capable video card from NVIDIA or AMD with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We have developers using Ubuntu 20.04 LTS and newer successfully, however we don’t provide support for specific distributions. We require proprietary GPU drivers.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 or Newer (e.g. Catalina, Big Sur, Monterey)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, i5, i7, or i9 CPU with 4 or more cores, or AMD Ryzen 3, 5, 7 or 9.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 500 or newer, driver version Adrenaline 22.2.1 or newer
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 or Newer (e.g. Catalina, Big Sur, Monterey)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8600k or Ryzen 5 3500 or better, or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Silicon OR AMD Radeon RX 500 or newer, driver version Adrenaline 22.2.1 or newer
  • Storage: 23 GB available space

name: X-Plane 12 Global Scenery: Australia, Oceania, Pacific

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, i5, i7, or i9 CPU with 4 or more cores, or AMD Ryzen 3, 5, 7 or 9.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A Vulkan 1.3-capable video card from NVIDIA or AMD with at least 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVIDIA: GeForce 900 or newer, driver version 510 or newerAMD: AMD Radeon RX 500 or newer, driver version Adrenaline 22.2.1 or newer.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8600k or Ryzen 5 3500 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A DirectX 12-capable video card from NVIDIA or AMD with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 23 GB available space

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
